name: Blinky: Reverse Pacman
description:
Blinky is a Pac-Man re-implementation, in which you play as Blinky (the red ghost). You should stop the mad devourer before he eats everything. The game will keep track of your "low score", that is the time when you allowed pac-man to score the least.

This game is a submission to the Godot Wild Jam #33. The theme of the jam is "You Aren't the Hero" (although, in my heart, Blinky is always the hero!).

You can play either with a keyboard or with a controller. Unfortunately there's no input remapping options (ran out of time!).

Mac version is completely untested. Windows version is tested under Wine.
